Sum of operating profit and nonoperating income (expense) before income taxes.

This element represents (i) the amount of share-based compensation recognized during the period, that is, the amount recognized as expense in the income statement, (ii) treasury stock reissued upon exercise of stock options and (iii) tax effect on stock compensation.
Value of stock issued during the period as a result of any other share-based compensation other than from stock options exercised.
